speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is he. Who’s calling?

speaker: Agent
text: This is Sarah from XYZ Collections. I'm reaching out regarding your account. Can you please confirm your date of birth for verification?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Mr. Johnson. Can you also confirm your current address?

speaker: Customer
text: I live at 123 Maple Street, Springfield.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. I can confirm that you have an outstanding balance of $500. What would you like to do about this?

speaker: Customer
text: I didn't realize it was that much. Can I set up a payment plan?

speaker: Agent
text: Absolutely, we can set up a payment plan for you. How much would you like to pay each month?

speaker: Agent
text: Great! I will set up the plan for $100 per month. Your first payment will be due on the 15th of next month.

speaker: Customer
text: Sounds good, thank you for your help.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! Thank you for your time, Mr. Johnson. Have a great day!
